duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing the operations and providing leadership and technical role in managing the infrastructure assets including the Network & Security, Server & Systems, Voice, and Telecom services.
Planning, strategizing, and ensuring key initiatives are developed and delivered in partnership with internal departmental and operational leaders.
Setting vision for support for third-party, on premise, and cloud applications and services.
Advancing the use of effective communication strategies such as dashboards and visual analytics.
Researching current and new industry trends, technologies, and software development practices.
Managing relationships with vendors, suppliers, carriers, and 3rd party vendors for technical support.
Making preparations for the office regarding changing weather conditions and building relationships with the property management team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science or equivalent work experience.
